name: Age of Wonders
content:
files:
- indeo_codec: http://lutris.net/files/games/age-of-wonders/indeo_codec.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 61500
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/system32/
    file: $indeo_codec
- task:
    key: C:\\windows\\system32\\iac25_32.ax
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SharedDLLs
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1
- task:
    key: C:\\windows\\system32\\iacenc.dll
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SharedDLLs
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1
- task:
    key: msacm.iac2
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Drivers32
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: C:\\windows\\system32\\iac25_32.ax
- task:
    key: vidc.iv31
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Drivers32
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: ir32_32.dll
- task:
    key: iv32
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Drivers32
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: ir32_32.dll
